question: Is Sotrovimab effective for COVID-19?
ideal_answer: Yes. Among high-risk patients with mild-to-moderate Covid-19, sotrovimab reduced the risk of disease progression.

snippets.text: It seems that monoclonal antibodies (e.g., low dosage bamlanivimab, baricitinib, imatinib, and sotrovimab) are a better choice for treating severe or non-severe COVID-19 patients.
The Food and Drug Administration has granted emergency use authorization to sotrovimab for the treatment of mild to moderate COVID-19 in patients at increased risk for progression to severe illness.

CONCLUSIONS: Among high-risk patients with mild-to-moderate Covid-19, sotrovimab reduced the risk of disease progression.
